item.description: Come down to Emerald City Smoothie (Evergreen Walk, near Rockville Bank Park) between 6-8 p.m. to return or fill out your volunteer schedule and receive a free smoothie! Wapping Fair is a 4 day agricultural fair Sept. 10-13 that draws over 20,000. The event helps the Jaycees donate over $10,000 each year to the community. Everyone is welcome, so if you have friends, coworkers, etc that might be interested in volunteering for the fair let them know. If you've already committed to help - come down anyway to meet some of the other volunteers.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for our bright smiling faces!
item.name: Wapping Fair Volunteer Sign Up
